summary:
After  High school in 1976, I  chose  for  French and English and obtained  my bachelor’s degree for French in 1986. Beside, being a French teacher for several years,  I set up a French conversation course. 
Due to the lack of vacancies, I did jobs on voluntary bases; Like writer of letters of mediation at Amnesty International,  a presenter of the local radio news for a year, a Dutch teacher for refugees for two years and  as a  legal aid  and  interpreter  for French and English at the council for refugees until 1995. This was preceded  by a  training.

The novel  Interview With The Vampire inspired me to start  writing my book Eleonore in 1994, which relates a part of my life story and serves as a serious warning against raising inexperienced ghosts.
As I  can´t stand injustice, I also undertook actions like helping to put an end to the hostage-taking in Lebanon through correspondence  and contacts of mediation with authorities, embassies, and the families, a petition on the street to prevent the capital punishment of a Philippine servant who had killed her boss out of self-defense in Saudi Arabia.
 
Meanwhile, as I took more interest in film and acting,  I  played  a part  in a reconstruction of a missing in a Dutch television program via an casting agency  and as a walk-on in several theater performances  in 1997  In 2004 I joined  a  theater performance which was located in a bus garage  with people of all classes of society, coached by some English directors.
After  a training of dancing, improvising, theater techniques, music and expression, we set up ¨ Bus stop Vechtstraat¨,  we performed with great success four times a week during three months.  

Then I  joined stage 32 in 2005 and finished my book Eleonore,  which was published in  2007 by Raider Publishing International. It led to a lot of fuss media attention  which was my purpose. 

 In the same year,  I  followed  an online screenwriter´s course of Dave Trottier and finished my first screenplay, St. Martin’s Secret in 2007. I embarked on several scripts. like Lost Family Ties and  the three parts of The Vampire Mysteries. An urgent message of Dolphins during my meditating on them and being a keen environmentalist,  obliged me to write Heaven´s Revolution, which is about the threats to our planet, cruel oppression and the loss of freedom. I finished this project in 2021 followed by a shorter one , The Sign  which is about the revolution of sea life toward the junk in Earth´s oceans.   My work addresses social topics centered on mutual human relations … with just a touch of magic!

profile_positions.description:
The Sign,
Budget: $100K - $1M | Animation -Adventure

LOG LINE;.Nutshell: “Finding Nemo” meets “Free Willy”

Logline: During a revolt of marine life about the litter in their oceans, an eager team of oceanographers exposes themselves to danger to save the animals from evil human actions.

MY CONNECTION TO THIS STORY
I want to raise public awareness about the threats to Earth’s oceans and our planet. The ocean is a vital ecosystem for all life on our planet, as it provides us with oxygen and has a very rich biodiversity. Action Groups like Greenpeace and Sea Shepherd – who do their utmost to save threatened marine life, stop overfishing, and fight for healthy oceans – propelled me to explore these characters.

WHY DOES THIS FILM NEED TO BE MADE NOW?
The pollution and extinction of marine life will have serious consequences for all life on our planet. It will cause a catastrophic domino effect; as plant and animal species depend on each other. I chose the Covid-19 period because at that time many plastic masks and gloves were thrown into the oceans and Mediterranean. I believe this film will bring awareness about the pollution and motivate people to clean up the oceans.

OVERVIEW
The oceans are huge and beautiful, full of animal and plant life. But junk – in massive amounts – pollutes the oceans and harms their inhabitants. Marine life gets fed up with humans throwing trash into their home, and these angry animals revolt. An eager team of oceanographers exposes themselves to danger to save the animals from fishermen who are determined to capture them.
profile_positions.title: Screenwriter

profile_positions.description:
Genres: Adventure/ Drama

Format: Feature

Nutshell: Noah´s Ark meets The Lord Of The Rings

Logline: In a world ravaged by global warming, a resolute psychic and a skilful natural scientist with their team make a risky journey to prevent a villainous movement from irreparably damaging Mother Nature, while treason lies in wait for them.

MY CONNECTION TO THIS STORY

I want to raise public awareness about the unique function of the cycle of nature, which deteriorates rapidly. Nature offers us vital ecosystems, fascinating animal and plant species, and a rich biodiversity which are perfectly geared to one another. Environmentalists - who strain every nerve to prevent irreparably damage to Mother Nature - propelled me to explore these characters and this world.

WHY DOES THIS FILM NEED TO BE MADE NOW?

Mainly human actions like emissions of fossil fuels, of nitrogen and significant amounts of particulates cause a dangerous rise of temperature. environmental pollution  and health decline of all life - while  damage to vital ecosystems drive many animal and plant species to extinction. I believe that this film will raise awareness about the critical stage nature has reached and motivate people to help nature to recover so that nature will restore the planet to its former self. Besides, this film  warns of the danger of dictatorial anti-climate groups.

OVERVIEW

The Earth is a  planet with vital ecosystems full of life but global warming, mainly due to human activity, forms a serious threat for its continual life. When an anti-climate movement  envelops the world in a dirty smog and causes damage to Mother Nature, a psychic wants to stop  their terror. Together with her  best friend,  and a team, she undertakes a risky journey to the headquarters of the movement, where she will discover that she must hold on to her mission and hope.
profile_positions.title: Screenwriter

profile_positions.description:
The Vampire Mysteries ( 3 ) 1.Treacherous Temptation, 2. Return To Transylvania, 3.Nightfall. 

 Log line;  Due to a spiritualist seance,  an adventurous American student gets entangled in the web of the very dark family secret of a  charismatic,  mysterious leader of a Vampire club.

The idea of the last two is; A  very  thrilling development and surprising denouement of a double reincarnation drama about discrimination in the form of tolerance and intolerance of homosexuality.
profile_positions.title: Screenwriter

profile_positions.description: As the book and film Interview With The Vampire inspired me to write down my life story I wrote my book “Eleonore” which I based on the main themes of Interview With The Vampire of which I elaborated  the literary  analysis first. Beside, I did a profound study of the paranormal phenomenons. Eleonore   was published in 2007 by Raider Publishing International .The book serves as a serious warning never to invoke ghosts inexperienced as it made me a child of the dark for 35 years  After 2007,  I  changed the title  into  “Road of Darkness  when I found out who I had invoked.on the 21st of August 2010. That story was not published but the media, newspapers and magazines showed great interest.

profile_positions.description:
To manage and update the files of the clients. Exploratory interviews and personal conversations with clients  regarding the contents of their story as refugee. 
To support the clients during the asylum procedure in the social and juridical field.
To function as a French and English interpreter
To maintain contact and correspondence with the client´s lawyer, the Immigration and Naturalization Service, the Alien Registration Department and the Job Centre as an intermediary and to be the client´s interlocutor.
Agency Duties; To offer assistance to clients in the juridical as well as in the social domain by finding a appropriate solution or by contacting the Official Bodies concerned to refer the clients to.
Meetings during which the client´s files were discussed and their actual situation.
profile_positions.title: Legal aid

profile_positions.description: Preparation, rehearsals and  several performances on  different locations and outside
profile_positions.title: As walk-on in the play, The Odyssey Travellers

profile_positions.description: Dutch teacher for asylumseekers at the council “Humanitas” on voluntary basis.When I decided to do a course as legal aid at the Council For Refugees, I stopped this work.

volunteer_experiences.description:
Private action concerning the hostage-taking in Lebanon and the
entire Middle-East question; Letters of mediation to the
authorities, oral and written personal contacts with diplomats of
embassies and Ministries of the Nations concerned, The same
kind of action for Bosnia.
Active member of Amnesty international. Writing letters of mediation to the authorities of the countried concerned, To read and discuss the country files within the adoption group.

To try to stop the massive killing of cattle, goats and sheep during  The Mouth and Foot crisis in the Netherlands and Europe: Letters addressed to the government. Inquiring role; contacts with authorities and organisations concerned.Network contacts with the media, repoters and journalists. Supporting role: contacts  with the afflicted farmer families.

volunteer_experiences.role: Action to stop the Dolphin Drive  and Whale hunting, fight for healthy oceans

company.name: Advocate of Dolphin Project ( since August 2014)

volunteer_experiences.description:
Action to stop the Dolphin and Whale hunt; Support to Ric O  ́Barry of The Cove, Sea Shepherd, Australia For Dolphins, letters to different authorities, distribute of leaflets to the public in the street to raise awareness of the hunt and not to buy tickets  to visit Dolphin and Orca shows, send messages to media to stop promoting Dolphin and Orca shows,. In general a broad
interest to protect species and to fight for the survival of the beauty of our planet for future generations. Therefore I wrote the story and the message of the Dolphins to the world they already passed to me in 2008 as the screenplay JOURNEY FOR HEAVEN
Mental and physical help and  support   to my parents till the end of their life.

Actions to stop the  hunt, captivity of Dolphins and Whales, to preserve the ecosystems and the species for future generations together with Dolphin Project, Action For Dolphins and Sea Shepherd in the form of; Petitions, letters of protest to the concerned authorities, distribute leaflets to the public on the street to raise awareness and not to buy tickets for Dolphin shows as well as to media and chain of stores.Therefore, I wrote the feature HEAVENS´RESOLUTION which is the story and implies the warning of the Dolphins they passes on to me already in 2008
